text: I'm sure this is a hot take in most circles, but i'm actually excited for them to get rid of the bike lanes. Maybe there will be less traffic!
I see more and more of those tent cities at places like Trinity Bellwoods, and i think to myself... Maybe i should just call it quits and live in a damn tent. How bad could it be?
I haven't tried Badiali and at this point I'm convinced there's no way its as good as everyone says. Or maybe I'm just coping...
I've asked all my friends, people who have lived in Toronto their whole lives, and none of us have ever been up the CN Tower.

I've had to call the police on my next door neighbors multiple times. They are always fighting and yelling at each other. I think I'm done tho. no more calls from me! we'll let fate decide what happens there...
Pizza Pizza is the best Pizza in the city. Who else is open at 2am when pizza is the most crucial?!
